sources.title: Hawaii Calls
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Hawaii Calls (1938) BOBBY BREEN
sources.description:
Stars: Bobby Breen, Ned Sparks, Irvin S. Cobb 
Director: Edward F. Cline

A young stow away on board an ocean liner sings for his travel fare and with the help of his sidekick turns detective to recover stolen naval documents!

metadata.Plot: After being nabbed while trying to stow away on board an ocean liner en route to Hawaii, young Bobby Breen sings for his travel fare and, along with sidekick Pua, turns detective to recover stolen naval documents from crooks
metadata.Actors: Bobby Breen, Ned Sparks, Irvin S. Cobb
